name: @hughescr/eslint-config-flow
description: ESLint config using @hughescr/eslint-config-default and adding Flow type annotation support

scripts.postversion: git commit -m "Bump package version to $npm_package_version" package.json package-lock.json; git flow release start $npm_package_version; git flow release finish -m $npm_package_version $npm_package_version; git checkout develop; git merge master

author: Craig Hughes <craig.npm@rungie.com>
